mapper.select: select S_NO,S_ADDR,S_NAME,S_LIMITPRICE,S_PAYOPT,S_TEXT,S_PHONE, S_OPENSTATUS,S_ENROLLSTATUS,S_ORIFOODINFO,S_LOGIMG ,S_TIME,B_NO,S_HOLIDAY,S_COUPON,to_char(S_STARTTIME,'HH24:MI:SS') AS S_STARTTIME, to_char(S_ENDTIME,'HH24:MI:SS') AS S_ENDTIME,S_ENROLLDATE from store where b_no=#{no}
select ct_name from category join store_category using(ct_no) where s_no =#{no}
select s_img from store_img where s_no =#{no}
mapper.update: update store set S_NAME=#{sname},S_ADDR=#{saddr},S_PHONE='${phone1}-${phone2}-${phone3}', S_LIMITPRICE=#{slimitprice},S_PAYOPT=#{spayopt},S_TEXT=#{stext},S_ORIFOODINFO=#{sorifoodinfo}, S_TIME=#{stime},S_HOLIDAY=#{sholiday,typeHandler=strArr},S_X=#{xl},S_Y=#{yl},S_COUPON=#{scoupon}, S_STARTTIME= TO_TIMESTAMP(#{sstarttime}, 'HH24') , S_ENDTIME=TO_TIMESTAMP(#{sendtime}, 'HH24') where s_no=#{sno}
mapper.select: SELECT S_NO,S_NAME,S_ADDR,ROUND((S_TASTE+S_AMOUNT+S_DELIVERY)/(DECODE(S_REVIEWCOUNT,0,1,S_REVIEWCOUNT)*3),1) AS SCORE,S_REVIEWCOUNT,S_ENROLLDATE,S_ENROLLSTATUS FROM STORE WHERE b_NO=#{no}

select * from (select a.*,rownum as rnum from( select to_date(to_char(o_date,'YY/MM/DD')) as orderdate , sum(o_oriprice) as price from order_info where s_no=#{no} group by to_date(to_char(o_date,'YY/MM/DD')) order by orderdate desc)a)where rnum between 1 and 31 order by orderdate
select * from(select ROWNUM as rnum , a.* from (select * from order_info where s_no=#{no} order by o_date ) a) where rnum between 1 and 5
select to_char(o_date,'YYYY/MM') as o_date ,sum(o_oriprice) as price from order_info where s_no=#{no} group by to_char(o_date,'YYYY/MM')
select me_name,sd_array from order_menu join menu using(me_no) where o_no=#{no}
